name: Bongo Bash!
description:
This was created in 2 days by Team 3 from EA's Get in the Game STEAM Camp 2021! 

Click Space to start and stop the game!

Use the "F" and "G" keys to control the left bongo and the "H" and "J" keys to control the right bongo. Simply tap to the rhythm of everyone's favorite classic "Cotton Eyed Joe"!
